identity.name: MedRead
identity.description: A high-precision medical diagnostic tool with a futuristic, immersive interface. Combines the raw data density of a medical cockpit with the neon-noir aesthetics of cyberpunk. Precision meets atmosphere.
principles: Clinical Precision in the Center: The image viewer is sacred. No distractions, perfect contrast.
Cyberpunk in the Periphery: Menus, sidebars, and HUDs use neon, glass, and tech-mono typography.
Dark Mode Default: Optimized for dark reading rooms. Deep blacks, not just dark greys.
Feedback is Immediate: Instant hover states, snappy transitions, 'tech' sounds (visualized).

images.description: Futuristic server room / medical bay background

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Prefer geometric/sharp icons (e.g., Activity, Zap, Shield, Scan, Grid).

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Implement the 'Clinical Cyberpunk' aesthetic. Use the provided Tailwind config extensions. Ensure the image viewer area is strictly neutral (black/matte) to preserve medical accuracy.
instructions_to_main_agent.landing_page: Use the 'landing_hero' image with a heavy dark overlay and scanlines. Hero text should be large, Orbitron font, with a neon glow.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Use a 'Control Room' layout. Sidebar for navigation, main area for stats/upload. Use 'glass' cards for widgets.
instructions_to_main_agent.reading_session: This is the core feature. Layout: Left sidebar (Patient Info/History), Center (Image Viewer - LARGE), Right sidebar (Diagnosis Controls). The Center area must be pure black (#000000). Pre-cache the next image.
instructions_to_main_agent.interactions: Add sound effects (optional/visual feedback) on clicks. Use 'sonner' for toasts with a custom dark/neon theme.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts with custom colors (Cyan, Pink, Green) on a dark background. No white backgrounds for charts.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
